Comment: What's great about this is that the same far-left element that put them in this hole is exploiting it to grab more power within the party. They also still seem to think their hold on places online, like Reddit, will save the day, but these places are losing ground to more entertaining platforms. The death spiral is beautiful to watch.
Author: According-Activity87
